Whenever you use this trait, choose one:,[object Object],Once you use your Metallic Breath Weapon, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aquan.

RacialTraits.name: Amphibious
RacialTraits.text: You can breathe air and water.

RacialTraits.name: Cat's Claws
RacialTraits.text: You can use your claws to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals {@damage 1d6} + your Strength modifier slashing damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

RacialTraits.name: Cat's Talent
RacialTraits.text: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} and {@skill Stealth} skills.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

RacialTraits.name: Speed
RacialTraits.text: Your walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Feline Agility
RacialTraits.text: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common.

RacialTraits.name: Speed
RacialTraits.text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Shifters tend toward neutrality, being more focused on survival than concepts of good and evil. A love of personal freedom can drive shifters toward chaotic alignments.

RacialTraits.name: Shifting
RacialTraits.text: As a bonus action, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a bonus action. When you shift, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You also gain additional benefits that depend on your shifter subrace, described below.,Once you shift, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Shifters are quick to mature both physically and emotionally, reaching young adulthood at age 10. They rarely live to be more than 70 years old.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Superior Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Otherworldly Perception
RacialTraits.text: You can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of you that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. You can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

RacialTraits.name: Slippery
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

RacialTraits.name: Amphibious
RacialTraits.text: You can breathe air and water.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Undercommon.

RacialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
RacialTraits.text: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

RacialTraits.name: Changeling Instincts
RacialTraits.text: Thanks to your connection to the fey realm, you gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}.

RacialTraits.name: Creature Type
RacialTraits.text: You are a Fey.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

RacialTraits.name: Shapechanger
RacialTraits.text: As an action, you change your appearance and your voice. You determine the specifics of the changes, including your coloration, hair length, and sex. You can also adjust your height between Medium and Small. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your game statistics change. You can't duplicate the appearance of an individual you've never seen, and you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs that you have. Your clothing and equipment aren't changed by this trait.,You stay in the new form until you use an action to revert to your true form or until you die.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Minotaur.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Minotaurs average over 6 feet in height, and they have stocky builds. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Note
RacialTraits.text: {@note These traits are also suitable for minotaurs in other D&D worlds where these people have avoided the demonic influence of Baphomet.}

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

RacialTraits.name: Goring Rush
RacialTraits.text: Immediately after you use the {@action Dash} action on your turn and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

RacialTraits.name: Imposing Presence
RacialTraits.text: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Intimidation} or {@skill Persuasion}.

RacialTraits.name: Horns
RacialTraits.text: Your horns are natural melee weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Most minotaurs who join the Boros Legion lean toward lawful alignments, while those associated with the Cult of Rakdos or the Gruul Clans tend toward chaotic alignments.

RacialTraits.name: Hammering Horns
RacialTraits.text: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as part of the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can use a bonus action to attempt to shove that target with your horns. The target must be no more than one size larger than you and within 5 feet of you. Unless it succeeds on a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier, you push it up to 10 feet away from you.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

RacialTraits.name: Pack Tactics
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

RacialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
RacialTraits.text: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Half-orcs mature a little faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14. They age noticeably faster and rarely live longer than 75 years.

RacialTraits.name: Spells of the Mark
RacialTraits.text: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Finding Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.,[object Object]

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Hunter's Intuition
RacialTraits.text: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

RacialTraits.name: Finder's Magic
RacialTraits.text: You can cast the {@spell hunter's mark} spell with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the {@spell locate object} spell with it. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Half-orcs are somewhat larger and bulkier than humans, and they range from 5 to well over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Half-orcs inherit a tendency toward chaos from their orc parents and are not strongly inclined toward good. Half-orcs raised among orcs and willing to live out their lives among them are usually evil.

RacialTraits.name: Charge
RacialTraits.text: If you move at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, you can immediately follow that attack with a bonus action, making one attack against the target with your hooves.

RacialTraits.name: Equine Build
RacialTraits.text: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push or drag.,In addition, any climb that requires hands and feet is especially difficult for you because of your equine legs. When you make such a climb, each foot of movement costs you 4 extra feet, instead of the normal 1 extra foot.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan. Sylvan is widely spoken in the Selesnya Conclave, for it is rich in vocabulary to describe natural phenomena and spiritual forces.

RacialTraits.name: Survivor
RacialTraits.text: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Survival}.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Centaurs are inclined toward neutrality. Those who join the Selesnya are more often neutral good, while those who join the Gruul are typically chaotic neutral.

RacialTraits.name: Hooves
RacialTraits.text: Your hooves are natural melee weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

RacialTraits.name: Fey
RacialTraits.text: Your creature type is fey, rather than humanoid.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Centaurs stand between 6 and 7 feet tall, with their equine bodies reaching about 4 feet at the withers. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Centaurs mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

RacialTraits.name: Expert Forgery
RacialTraits.text: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Kenku are around 5 feet tall and weigh between 90 and 120 pounds. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.

RacialTraits.name: Mimicry
RacialTraits.text: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check opposed by your Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check.

RacialTraits.name: Kenku Training
RacialTraits.text: You are proficient in your choice of two of the following skills: {@skill Acrobatics}, {@skill Deception}, {@skill Stealth}, and {@skill Sleight of Hand}.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

RacialTraits.name: Undead Nature
RacialTraits.text: You are immune to poison damage and {@condition exhaustion}, and you can't be {@condition poisoned}. You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can't speak, but you can understand the languages you knew in life.

RacialTraits.name: Brittle Bones
RacialTraits.text: You are vulnerable to bludgeoning damage.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Psychic Resilience
RacialTraits.text: You have resistance to psychic damage.

RacialTraits.name: Astral Knowledge
RacialTraits.text: You can mystically access a reservoir of experiences of entities connected to the Astral Plane. Whenever you finish a long rest, you gain proficiency in one skill of your choice and with one weapon or tool of your choice, selected from the Player's Handbook, as you momentarily project your consciousness into the Astral Plane. These proficiencies last until the end of your next long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Githyanki Psionics
RacialTraits.text: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip, and the hand is {@condition invisible} when you cast the cantrip with this trait.,Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell jump} spell with this trait. Starting at 5th level, you can also cast {@spell misty step} with it. Once you cast {@spell jump} or {@spell misty step} with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast either of those spells using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.,Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this race). None of these spells require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

RacialTraits.name: Celestial Revelation
RacialTraits.text: When you reach 3rd level, choose one of the revelation options below. Thereafter, you can use a bonus action to unleash the celestial energy within yourself, gaining the benefits of that revelation. Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. Once you transform using your revelation below, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.,[object Object]

RacialTraits.name: Light Bearer
RacialTraits.text: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

RacialTraits.name: Celestial Resistance
RacialTraits.text: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

RacialTraits.name: Healing Hands
RacialTraits.text: As an action, you can touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your proficiency bonus. The creature regains a number of hit points equal to the total rolled. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Deathless Nature
RacialTraits.text: You don't need to breathe.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you gain this lineage.

RacialTraits.name: Vampiric Bite
RacialTraits.text: Your fanged bite is a natural weapon, which counts as a simple melee weapon with which you are proficient. You add your Constitution modifier, instead of your Strength modifier, to the attack and damage rolls when you attack with this bite. It deals {@damage 1d4} piercing damage on a hit. While you are missing half or more of your hit points, you have advantage on attack rolls you make with this bite.,When you attack with this bite and hit a creature that isn't a Construct or an Undead, you can empower yourself in one of the following ways of your choice:,[object Object],You can empower yourself with this bite a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Spider Climb
RacialTraits.text: You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. In addition, at 3rd level, you can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness as shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Ancestral Legacy
RacialTraits.text: If you replace a race with this lineage, you can keep the following elements of that race: any skill proficiencies you gained from it and any climbing, flying, or swimming speed you gained from it.,If you don't keep any of those elements or you choose this lineage at character creation, you gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

RacialTraits.name: Mountain Born
RacialTraits.text: You have resistance to cold damage. You're also acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

RacialTraits.name: Natural Athlete
RacialTraits.text: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} skill.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Goliaths have lifespans comparable to humans. They enter adulthood in their late teens and usually live less than a century.

RacialTraits.name: Powerful Build
RacialTraits.text: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Goliaths are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 280 and 340 pounds. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Giant.

RacialTraits.name: Stone's Endurance
RacialTraits.text: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d12}. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Vedalken mature slower than humans do, reaching maturity around age 40. Their life span is typically 350 years, with some living to the age of 500.

RacialTraits.name: Vedalken Dispassion
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common, Vedalken, and one other language of your choice.

RacialTraits.name: Partially Amphibious
RacialTraits.text: By absorbing oxygen through your skin, you can breathe underwater for up to 1 hour. Once you've reached that limit, you can't use this trait again until you finish a long rest.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Tall and slender, Vedalken stand 6 to 6Â½ feet tall on average and usually weigh less than 200 pounds. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Tireless Precision
RacialTraits.text: You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Sleight of Hand}. You are also proficient with one {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice.,Whenever you make an ability check with the chosen skill or tool, roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the check's total.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Vedalken are usually lawful and non-evil.

RacialTraits.name: Primal Intuition
RacialTraits.text: You have proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, and {@skill Survival}.

RacialTraits.name: Powerful Build
RacialTraits.text: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: The orcs of Eberron are a passionate people, given to powerful emotion and deep faith. They are generally chaotic, but can be any alignment.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Orcs reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

RacialTraits.name: Aggressive
RacialTraits.text: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

RacialTraits.name: Celestial Legacy
RacialTraits.text: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell lesser restoration} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Once you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell daylight} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: Thanks to your celestial heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

RacialTraits.name: Celestial Resistance
RacialTraits.text: You have resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

RacialTraits.name: Language
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Celestial.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Aasimar are built like well-proportioned humans. Your size is Medium.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Aasimar mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

RacialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on saving throws against spells.

RacialTraits.name: Serpentine Spellcasting
RacialTraits.text: You know the {@spell poison spray} cantrip. You can cast {@spell animal friendship} an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast {@spell suggestion} with this trait. Once you cast it, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast it using any spell slots you have of 2nd level or higher.,Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this race).

RacialTraits.name: Poison Resilience
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition poisoned} condition on yourself. You also have resistance to poison damage.

RacialTraits.name: Amphibious
RacialTraits.text: You can breathe air and water.

RacialTraits.name: Size
RacialTraits.text: Grungs stand between 2Â½ and 3Â½ feet tall and average about 30 pounds. Your size is Small.

RacialTraits.name: Arboreal Alertness
RacialTraits.text: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} skill.

RacialTraits.name: Poisonous Skin
RacialTraits.text: Any creature that grapples you or otherwise comes into direct contact with your skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature no longer in direct contact with you can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.,You can also apply this poison to any piercing weapon as part of an attack with that weapon, though when you hit the poison reacts differently. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take {@dice 2d4} poison damage.

RacialTraits.name: Age
RacialTraits.text: Grungs mature to adulthood in a single year, but have been known to live up to 50 years.

RacialTraits.name: Poison Immunity
RacialTraits.text: You're immune to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

RacialTraits.name: Standing Leap
RacialTraits.text: Your long jump is up to 25 feet and your high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Most grungs are lawful, having been raised in a strict caste system. They tend toward evil as well, coming from a culture where social advancement occurs rarely, and most often because another member of your army has died and there is no one else of that caste to fill the vacancy.

RacialTraits.name: Water Dependency
RacialTraits.text: If you fail to immerse yourself in water for at least 1 hour during a day, you suffer one level of {@condition exhaustion} at the end of that day. You can only recover from this {@condition exhaustion} through magic or by immersing yourself in water for at least 1 hour.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Grung.

RacialTraits.name: Mimicry
RacialTraits.text: You can mimic any sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

RacialTraits.name: Ambusher
RacialTraits.text: In the first round of a combat, you have advantage on attack rolls against any creature who is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.

RacialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
RacialTraits.text: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

RacialTraits.name: Stench
RacialTraits.text: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 ft. of you must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

RacialTraits.name: Languages
RacialTraits.text: You can speak, read, and write Troglodyte.

RacialTraits.name: Darkvision
RacialTraits.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

RacialTraits.name: Chameleon Skin
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

RacialTraits.name: Natural Armor
RacialTraits.text: Your thick hide grants you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

RacialTraits.name: Loxodon Serenity
RacialTraits.text: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

RacialTraits.name: Trunk
RacialTraits.text: You can grasp things with your trunk, and you can use it as a snorkel. It has a reach of 5 feet, and it can lift a number of pounds equal to five times your Strength score. You can use it to do the following simple tasks: lift, drop, hold, push, or pull an object or a creature; open or close a door or a container; grapple someone; or make an unarmed strike. Your DM might allow other simple tasks to be added to that list of options.,Your trunk can't wield weapons or shields or do anything that requires manual precision, such as using tools or magic items or performing the somatic components of a spell.

RacialTraits.name: Alignment
RacialTraits.text: Most loxodons are lawful, believing in the value of a peaceful, ordered life. They also tend toward good.

RacialTraits.name: Keen Smell
RacialTraits.text: Thanks to your sensitive trunk, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}), Wisdom ({@skill Survival}), and Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) checks that involve smell.

RacialTraits.name: Natural Armor
RacialTraits.text: You have thick, leathery skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Constitution modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.,[object Object]

RacialTraits.name: Powerful Build
RacialTraits.text: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

RacialTraits.name: Age
